content.body: Jake Archibald: Are you looking for feedback in some area in particular? Just in case I need to check with the graphics folks and so on :)

content.body: emilio: I want to make sure the feature isn't designed "for Chromium". As in, are there changes that could be made to make it easier to implement in Gecko (without compromising developer experience)? Are there parts of the design that you feel currently compromise developer experience due to an implementation detail unique to Chromium. But also I'd just like a general review of the feature from someone familiar with the platform.
